hanzi-su-wiki:
賠

Значения

Возмещать, компенсировать

Мнемоника

Справа — искажённая истина, когда рот 口 неустойчив 立, кратность, преувеличение. Отдавать деньги 貝 сторицей, т.е. во много раз больше, чем взято.

Варианты

赔
purpleculture_pinyin:
péi
to compensate for loss; to indemnify; to suffer a financial loss
возместить убыток; возместить ущерб; понести финансовый убыток

heisig_chinese_memo: Compensateion is money you give to someone to shut them up (i.e. muzzle their mouth).
heisig_constituent: compensation, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight, muzzle, vase, stand up, mouth
heisig_story: Picture a clam used as a muzzle to quiet the complaints of a fisherman's widow asking compensation for her husband lost at sea.

намордник? ваза на рту
koohiiStory1: Compensation is money you give to someone to shut them up (i.e. muzzle their mouth).
koohiiStory2: Compensation is a kind of euphemism for hush money here. Money that muzzles.
jp_example_words: 賠償(ばいしょう): reparations, indemnity, compensation
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You give a bunch of shellfish to a clown as compensation. The clown did you some favors, and everyone knows clowns only accept shellfish as a form of currency. So your compensation is a pile of random shellfish.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the shellfish in your hands. Imagine handing them over to the clown as compensation for the unspeakable acts you had him do for you.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Once the clown has been properly compensated, he looks you in the eyes, one hand full of shellfish, the other in the air, and waves, "Bye (ばい)" he says. "Bye, bye."
WaniKani_Reading_Info: All you have to do is give him the right amount of compensation and you'll hear his sweet "bye, bye." Then you never have to see him again.
Ru_Notes:
Обычно убытки.
Не путать: 倍 (バイ удваивать), 培 (つちかう、バイ выращивать), 陪 (バイ быть в свите, сопровождать), 剖 (ボウ разделять).

Ru_trainchinese: péi: (глаг) терпеть убытки; возмещать, компенсировать; извиняться
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the standing mouths (咅) use the shellfish (貝) as compensation
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The super clam tries to compensate the clam companies to stop clam fishing but when they refuse he muzzles all humans to stop them from eating clams instead.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Bei " to "咅" sound. The original meaning is compensation and compensation. "Zhengzitong. Beibu": "Compensation for people and property means compensation." For example, the fourth fold of Guan Hanqing's "Pei Du Huandai" in the Yuan Dynasty: "The saint is poor, and he will return the old man to the old man with three thousand pennies." "Ming Shi. "Bing Zhi": "The death of a stallion, the number of breeding horses cannot be counted, and it will be compensated."

The extension of " compensation " means courtesy compensation, such as apologizing for gifts and sins. Such as "Jing Shi Tong Yan. Wang Anshi's trilemma: Su Xueshi: "Master scholar, ignore it for a while, and get lost in the unknown. Why can't the master of Jingzhong make a plea for it, and he will inevitably rejoice." Chapter 75 of "Dream of Red Mansions": "I woke up the next day and regretted it." I didn’t have to come home to make amends.”

" Compensation " also means loss and expense. For example, Chapter 55 of "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms": "Zhou Lang planned to settle the world, he lost his wife and broke down." Chapter 20 of "The Scholars": "The choice of the book always acts as the master; if it fails, the bookstore will lose the book."
humanum_short_description_en: From " Bei " to "咅" sound. The original meaning is compensation and compensation.
humanum_full_description:
從「貝」，「咅」聲。本義是補償、賠償。《正字通．貝部》：「補償人財物曰賠。」如元代關漢卿《裴度還帶》第四摺：「聖人可憐，將老夫賠過贓三千貫盡給還老夫。」《明史．兵志》：「種馬死，孳生不及數，輒賠補。」

　　「賠」引申表示禮節上的補償，如賠禮、賠罪。如《警世通言．王安石三難蘇學士》：「學士大人，一時忽略，陷於不知，何不到京中太師門下賠罪一番，必然回嗔作喜。」《紅樓夢》第75回：「第二日才醒，後悔不及，只得來家賠罪。」

　　「賠」也表示虧蝕、耗費。如《三國演義》第55回：「周郎妙計安天下，賠了夫人又折兵。」《儒林外史》第20回：「選本總以行為主；若是不行，書店就要賠本。」
humanum_short_description: 從「貝」，「咅」聲。本義是補償、賠償。

賠償(ばいしょう): reparations, indemnity, compensation
從「 貝 」，「 咅 」聲。本義是補償、賠償。《正字通．貝部》：「補償人財物曰賠。」如元代關漢卿《裴度還帶》第四摺：「聖人可憐，將老夫賠過贓三千貫盡給還老夫。」《明史．兵志》：「種馬死，孳生不及數，輒賠補。」 「 賠 」引申表示禮節上的補償，如賠禮、賠罪。如《警世通言．王安石三難蘇學士》：「學士大人，一時忽略，陷於不知，何不到京中太師門下賠罪一番，必然回嗔作喜。」《紅樓夢》第75回：「第二日才醒，後悔不及，只得來家賠罪。」 「 賠 」也表示虧蝕、耗費。如《三國演義》第55回：「周郎妙計安天下，賠了夫人又折兵。」《儒林外史》第20回：「選本總以行為主；若是不行，書店就要賠本。」
From " Bei" to " 咅" sound. The original meaning is compensation and compensation. "Zhengzitong. Beibu": "Compensation for people and property means compensation." For example, the fourth fold of Guan Hanqing's "Pei Du Huandai" in the Yuan Dynasty: "The saint is poor, and he will return the old man to the old man with three thousand pennies." "Ming Shi. "Bing Zhi": "The death of a stallion, the number of breeding horses cannot be counted, and it will be compensated." The extension of " compensation" means courtesy compensation, such as apologizing for gifts and sins. Such as "Jing Shi Tong Yan. Wang Anshi's trilemma: Su Xueshi: "Master scholar, ignore it for a while, and get lost in the unknown. Why can't the master of Jingzhong make a plea for it, and he will inevitably rejoice." Chapter 75 of "Dream of Red Mansions": "I woke up the next day and regretted it." I didn’t have to come home to make amends.” " Compensation" also means loss and expense. For example, Chapter 55 of "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms": "Zhou Lang planned to settle the world, he lost his wife and broke down." Chapter 20 of "The Scholars": "The choice of the book always acts as the master; if it fails, the bookstore will lose the book."

賠字的基本解释

賠
péi
见“赔”。

賠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［péi］
［《字彙》音裴］
“赔1”的繁体字。
(1)赔偿，偿还。
(2)陪嫁。
(3)亏蚀；耗损。

賠字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　賠； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1209第24
【字彙】古無此字。俗音裴，作賠補之字。○按《正字通》備字註：賠，本作僃。楊愼曰：僃，音賠，義同。昔高歡立法盜私家十僃五，官物十僃三，後周詔盜官物雖經赦免，徵備如法。備，補償也。俗用賠。

賠字的源字形

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［péi］
[Sound Pei of "Zihui"]
"Compensation 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Compensation and repayment.
(2) Dowry.
(3) Loss; depletion.
pay
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　Compensation; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1209 Page 24
【Vocabulary】There was no such word in ancient times. The common accent Pei is a word for compensating. ○According to the "Zhengzitong" note: Compensation, this is a 僃. Yang Yan said: 僃, sound compensation, meaning the same. In the past, Gaohuan legislated to steal ten and five from private houses, and ten and three from official property. Even though Zhouzhao's theft of official property was pardoned, the law was collected. Preparation, compensation also. Common use compensation.

Name meaning

péi
вм. 赔
Radicals: 貝, 咅  (shellfish, clown)
Meaning Mnemonic
You give a bunch of shellfish to a clown as compensation. The clown did you some favors, and everyone knows clowns only accept shellfish as a form of currency. So your compensation is a pile of random shellfish.
Picture the shellfish in your hands. Imagine handing them over to the clown as compensation for the unspeakable acts you had him do for you.
Reading Mnemonic
Once the clown has been properly compensated, he looks you in the eyes, one hand full of shellfish, the other in the air, and waves, "Bye (ばい)" he says. "Bye, bye."
All you have to do is give him the right amount of compensation and you'll hear his sweet "bye, bye." Then you never have to see him again.
